attributes.action: Impose a rating system on books distiguishing age suitability.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think a rating system should be imposed on the purchase of books, similar to dvd's as I know of a book I've read, which contained explicit and some racist comments in it which are definately not suitable for my age range. So there should be a system where the content suitability is CLEARLY advertised to potential buyers.
